name: node-red-node-feedparser
description: A Node-RED node to get RSS Atom feeds.
readme: node-red-node-feedparser ======================== A Node-RED node to read RSS and Atom feeds. Install ------- Run the following command in your Node-RED user directory - typically `~/.node-red` npm install node-red-node-feedparser Usage ----- ### Input Monitors an RSS/atom feed for new entries. You can set the polling time in minutes. Defaults to 15 minutes.
